bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.translation: Most surely man is in loss,

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
ayas.translation: Except those who believe and do good, and enjoin on each other truth, and enjoin on each other patience.
ayas.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti watawāṣaw bil ḥaqqi watawāṣaw biṣ ṣabr
